room_title: Escape room "Rameses Revenge" by Escape It Houston in Houston
review: Loved this one.  Felt like I was in an Indiana Jones Movie. The decor and props were well done.  The clues required the entire group to participate.  It was great as other rooms I have played left 2 smart people figuring everything out and the rest of group just standing around.  Highly recommend this one!

room_title: Escape room "Rameses Revenge" by Escape It Houston in Houston
review: Some friends and I decided to go try this place out just for fun and it was honestly the most fun we have had in such a long time! The Ramses Revenge challenge is really a lot of fun and it's designed so well. I can't wait to go back! Worth every penny!

room_title: Escape room "Rameses Revenge" by Escape It Houston in Houston
review: Thank you ANGEL for showing us the best time possible we had soooo much fun we did Rameses Revenge and Quarantine but we loved Rameses Revenge so much more it was so amazing totally immersed in our surrounding can't wait to come back and try the Titanic room

room_title: Escape room "Rameses Revenge" by Escape It Houston in Houston
review: This was a cool experience, The Rameses Revenge had authentic design. This one was sorta easy but kinda not so easy. I'd recommend it though. We highly enjoyed ourselves and I our host Dakota and the rest of the staff was awesome!!

room_title: Escape room "Rameses Revenge" by Escape It Houston in Houston
review: The experience here exceeded my expectations! We had Rameses Revenge and the room was very authentic and the details were right on. The puzzles weren't too hard or too easy. The group I was with offered up a different piece to solve the puzzle! We made it out with a few minutes to spare!! Definitely going back for the Titanic room!!! Highly recommend for anyone who likes to solves puzzles!
